about_the_game:
TURN YOUR WEBCAM INTO AN EYE TRACKER

Say goodbye to bulky hardware trackers. Upgrade your webcam with AI-powered eye tracking software and try the demo now!

Gaming Extensions for Eye Tracking

Immersive In-Game Camera Control with Eye Tracking

Enhance your gaming experience with the Beam Eye Tracker, the AI-powered webcam eye tracker. No extra hardware is required. Harness eye tracking and 6 DoF head tracking for intuitive in-game camera control using the OpenTrack extension, diving into a VR-like experience on your PC. From titles like Assetto Corsa and Microsoft Flight Simulator to ETS2 and beyond, increase your field of view with Beam and immerse yourself across 200+ games.

E-Sports Training

Discover extensions that further enhance gameplay, such as the Minimap Awareness Trainer to refine your minimap-checking skills.

Eye Tracking Overlay

Gaming Analytics Tools

Gain valuable insights into your gaming habits with our eye tracking overlay. Record your gameplay using tools like OBS, and review your focus during critical game moments. Analyze and understand your attention patterns to sharpen your decision-making and improve overall performance. Plus, if you prefer, hide the overlay for yourself while still capturing it in recordings.

Streaming Enhancements

Elevate your live streams on platforms like Twitch and YouTube. With our eye tracking overlay, let your viewers see exactly where you're looking on the screen in real-time. Personalize your streams further by customizing the overlay's color and opacity to match your unique style, making your content more engaging and interactive. You can choose to hide the overlay from your own view, yet still broadcast it to your audience.

Eye Tracking for Everyone

No webcam? No problem.

You can easily transform your smartphone into a high-quality webcam by selecting one of the many free apps available, for more info join the conversation here on our Steam forum. There is also the option to use FaceID-enabled iOS devices as trackers, offloading the processing from the PC to the iPhone or iPad and taking advantage of an increased tracking robustness using the 3D TrueDepth selfie camera.

60+FPS Eye Tracking for Supported Webcams

Beam Eye Tracker enables 60FPS+ tracking on webcams that support higher frame rates for a smooth tracking experience and reduced latency. Make sure to set the performance mode to "high performance" for the best experience.

Productivity and Privacy Features

Multi-Screen Pointer & Mouse Jumping

Enjoy seamless tracking across multiple screens and reduce the physical movement needed to move your cursor with Mouse Jumping. The software provides an efficient, streamlined experience without sacrificing your range of motion.

Presence Detection & Privacy Filter

Boost your security with the presence detection feature, automatically locking your screen when you're not present. Enhance privacy with the Privacy Filter, blurring parts of your screen that you're not looking at, providing an additional layer of protection for your sensitive information. Beam operates in real-time, right on your device without generating, storing, or transferring any biometric data or video recordings.

200+ Head & Eye Tracking Games

Below is a selection of OpenTrack-compatible games including racing, driving, space, bus, car, truck, farming, flight, combat, FPS, RPG, MOBA, & other simulator game genres.

Flight Simulation Games

Experience unparalleled realism in flight simulation games with our gaze and head tracking feature. Control your in-game camera with the movement of your eyes and head for a truly immersive experience, making flying feel like the real thing.

  • War Thunder

  • Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024

  • Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020

  • Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition

  • Top Gun: Maverick Expansion

  • IL-2 Sturmovik: Great Battles

  • IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad

  • DCS World

  • DCS World Steam Edition

  • X-Plane 12

  • X-Plane 11

  • AeroFly FS2

Space Simulation Games

Immerse yourself in the vastness of space with our eye and head tracking features in space simulation games. Control your in-game camera with the movements of your eyes and head, exploring the galaxy intuitively and naturally, making every journey feel like a true space adventure.

  • Star Citizen

  • Elite Dangerous

  • Star Wars: Squadrons

  • Kerbal Space Program

Racing Simulation Games

Take your racing simulator experience to the next level with our head and eye tracking features. Control your in-game camera with the movements of your eyes and head, allowing you to easily spot the competition and make split-second decisions for an even more immersive and realistic gameplay experience.

  • Assetto Corsa

  • Assetto Corsa Competizione

  • F1 2024

  • F1 2023

  • F1 2022

  • iRacing

  • Dirt 5

  • Project Cars 3

Driving Simulation Games

Elevate your driving simulator experience with our head and eye tracking features. Control your in-game camera with the movements of your eyes and head, allowing you to look around your vehicle and check your mirrors for a more realistic and immersive gameplay experience.

  • BeamNG.drive

  • Euro Truck Simulator 2

  • American Truck Simulator

  • Farming Simulator 25

  • Farming Simulator 22

  • Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop

  • Dirt 5

FPS Games

Dominate the battlefield with our eye and head tracking features in FPS games. Control your in-game camera with the movements of your eyes and head, allowing you to quickly and easily spot enemies and aim with precision.

  • Arma 3

  • DayZ

  • Insurgency: Sandstorm

name: Beam Eye Tracker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Standard Webcam (built-in or external) or iOS device with Face ID support required. Webcam min. resolution VGA.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Processors with Intel AVX2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Intel Processor Graphics, including Intel HD Graphics and Intel Iris Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Standard Webcam (built-in or external) or iOS device with Face ID support required. Webcam min. resolution VGA.

reviews:

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ – Nightmare_se, Twitch Streamer, Veteran Gamer

“Simply the best way to track your head and eye movements in your favourite games like Euro Truck Simulator 2 without buying expensive physical hardware! Use your webcam or phone as a tracking device!”
